snippet: The new law allows authorities to bar the candidacy of supporters of the Muslim Brotherhood, the Islamist group that dominated Egypt’s free elections after the 2011 uprising.
abstract: Military-appointed interim Egyptian Pres Adly Mansour issues election law that experts say all but eliminates chance of parliamentary opposition to his successor Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.
lead_paragraph: The new law allows authorities to bar the candidacy of supporters of the Muslim Brotherhood, the Islamist group that dominated Egypt’s free elections after the 2011 uprising.

headline.main: Egyptian Election Law Helps to Block Opposition
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Election Law Helps to Block Opposition
